mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing the Big Band Sound with Dick Dorney and his fourteen piece orchestra, Pam Miller, and Jimmie Bryant at the Godfather on August 15. Poster features metal photoplates of Dick Dorney, Pam Miller, and Jimmie Bryant. Poster was used to design a reorder. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31138.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
